subject: re:Top listed medications 4 you
body:
Dear customer.
Do you shop for drugs on the Web regularly? If yes, read this letter to the end since it contains the information you will definitely find useful.
At CanadianPharmacy you will be able to find all the drugs you shop for in your USA pharmacy. The only difference is that our drugs are 100% generic and are sold at a much lower price. CanadianPharmacy save together with our discount Canadian Web pharmacy.
CanadianPharmacy the only Canadian Web pharmacy to be recommended by FDA.
Sincerely yours,Lane Quinones
